snippet: Egypt's top satirist returned to television on Friday for the first airing of his show since it was pulled three months ago, and he skewered the public and media for lionizing the army chief widely expected to be the country's next president....

headline.print_headline: Egypt's Top TV Satirist Returns, Criticizes Public for Lionizing Sisi
headline.main: Egypt's Top TV Satirist Returns, Criticizes Public for Lionizing Sisi

lead_paragraph: Egypt's top satirist returned to television on Friday for the first airing of his show since it was pulled three months ago, and he skewered the public and media for lionizing the army chief widely expected to be the country's next president.
